channel.title: The Fallen Vilage - About to do The Impossible
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Fallen Vilage - About to do The Impossible" - Auto-accept turned on, just need to fill up to do the Impossible Mission

item.title: The Fallen Vilage - About to do The Impossible
item.content:encoded:
We now have everything we need to do the Impossible Mission - except 50 villagers. Join now to beat the rush to get Survived the Impossible.

We have all Tier Two upgrades, including ROOT and Pizzawitch, and have regular Kaiju fights while we wait to fill up.

We also hold a daily raffle between all villagers who patrolled the previous day, for a first prize of 10RP and a second prize of 2 TACOs.
